Sentencas: LaBaCo2O5 (+) (delta) (LBCO) materials are considered promising for a number of important technologies such as solid oxide fuel cells, batteries, chemical sensors, and thin-film functional devices related to giant magnetoresistance and spintronics.
Titulo: Optical study of semi-metallic LaBaCo2O5 + δ epitaxial films on MgO deposited by magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: In this work, we report the optical properties of LBCO films, which were deposited on MgO (001) substrate by exploring the optimized growth using a radio-frequency magnetron sputtering method.
Titulo: Optical study of semi-metallic LaBaCo2O5 + δ epitaxial films on MgO deposited by magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The LBCO film was found having an optical response different from a typical metal or a semiconductor.
Titulo: Optical study of semi-metallic LaBaCo2O5 + δ epitaxial films on MgO deposited by magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The LBCO film has rather large optical absorption, which almost linearly decreases from 3.7 x 10(5) to 6.7 x 10(3) cm(-1) in the spectral range from 4.5 to 0.1 eV.
Titulo: Optical study of semi-metallic LaBaCo2O5 + δ epitaxial films on MgO deposited by magnetron sputtering

Sentencas: The optical conductivity suggests that the LBCO films have potential for applications of optoelectronic devices, such as photodetectors and solar cells.
Titulo: Optical study of semi-metallic LaBaCo2O5 + δ epitaxial films on MgO deposited by magnetron sputtering
